(Simplified: 泸)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 盧 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 盧 [ lú ] cottage, hut; black; surname
①(瀘水)ａ．水名，金沙江在中國四川省宜賓市以上、四川省和雲南省交界處的一段；b．水名，即怒江。
瀘定 [ lú dìng ]: Luding county (Tibetan: lcags zam rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州 , Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)
瀘定橋 [ lú dìng qiáo ]: Luding Bridge over Dadu river 大渡河 in Sichuan, built by Kangxi in 1706, linking Luding county Sichuan Luding county 泸定县 with Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州
瀘定縣 [ lú dìng xiàn ]: Luding county (Tibetan: lcags zam rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州 , Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)
瀘州 [ lú zhōu ]: Luzhou prefecture-level city in Sichuan
瀘州市 [ lú zhōu shì ]: Luzhou prefecture-level city in Sichuan

瀘字的基本解释

瀘
lú
见“泸”。

瀘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lú］
［《廣韻》落胡切，平模，來。］
“泸1”的繁体字。
(1)水名。泸水，指今金沙江在四川宜宾以上、云南、四川交界处的一段。
(2)古州名。南朝梁置。治所在今四川省泸州市。

瀘字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　瀘； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页659第42
【廣韻】洛乎切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】龍都切，?音盧。水名，出牂牁。一名苦水。【水經注】禁水，北注瀘津水。【益州記】瀘水，源出曲羅，又下合諸水，而總其目，故有瀘江之名。　又州名。【廣輿記】本巴國地，梁曰瀘州。

Lu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [lú]
["Guangyun" Luo Huqie, flat model, come. ]
"Lu1" in traditional characters.
(1) Water name. Lushui refers to the section of Jinsha River above Yibin, Sichuan, and the junction of Yunnan and Sichuan.
(2) The name of the ancient state. Liang Zhi in the Southern Dynasties. Governance is located in Luzhou City, Sichuan Province.
Lu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Shui Zi Department] 　 Lu; Kangxi strokes: 20; Page number: page 659 42
[Guang Yun] Luo Huqie [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Long Du Qi,? Yin Lu. The name of the water, out of the 牂牁. A bitter. 【Water Classic】Prohibit water, inject Lujin water from the north. [Yizhou Ji] Lushui, originated from Quluo, combined with all rivers, and has its head, so it has the name of Lujiang.　Also the name of the state. [Guang Yu Ji] The land of Benba, Liang Yue Luzhou.
